Question
========

The probability of a Type II error increases as

Answerlist
----------

* The effect size increases
* The probability of a Type I error decreases.
* The sample size increases

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The effect size increases: Incorrect
* The probability of a Type I error becomes smaller: Correct
* The sample size becomes larger: Incorrect
